p.k: The Bears are fed up with the decay of etiquette at today’s theatres and become cultural ninjas to shush people who ruin the movie for others with their bad manners. / Pet Shop tells the tale of where the Baby Bears once lived. / Chloe, a child prodigy, finds it difficult to connect with her much older classmates. The Bears take her under their wing and show her how to make great college friends. / When Grizz comes home with a live crab, he thinks it can become a pet for the brothers to share. However, the crab pinches Ice Bear's ear and won't let go…
